text: wlqd dbbar aladhin min qablihim almkayd lrslhm, kama faeal hwla' maeak, falilah almakr jmyeana, fybtl mkrhm, wyeydh ealayhim bialkhaybat walndm, yaelam subhanah ma taksib kulu nafs min khayr 'aw sharun ftjaza elyh. wasayaelam alkufaar -'idha qadamuu ealaa rbhm- liman takun aleaqibat almhmwdt baed hadhih aldnya? 'iinaha latbae alrsl. wafi hdha tahdid wweyd llkafryn
